subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: In an emotional news conference, Rutgers’ players spoke about their hurt and anger after Don Imus, the radio talk show host, derided them as “nappy-headed hos.”
snippet: In an emotional news conference, Rutgers’ players spoke about their hurt and anger after Don Imus, the radio talk show host, derided them as “nappy-headed hos.”
